description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              If you are a student or a fresh graduate who is eager to gain the very first working experience in a good environment, join our team and you will:
              

              1. Recruitment - 70%
              
              •      Screening CV & phone interviewing with potential candidates,  and arranging appointments for interviews.
              
              •	Assisting HR team with other HR teamwork, internal events and projects.
              
              •	Translating HR materials from English to Vietnamese and vice versa.
              
              •	Developing a pool of qualified candidates in advance of need;
              

              2. Training  - 30%
              
              •	Administration of training events. This includes preparation work before, during and after training events;
              
              •	Assist with the scheduling of training courses, booking trainers, and notifying all attendants.
              
              •	Ensure all training materials, facilities, catering, and other training arrangements are well set up for each training event.
              
              •	Update learning management records following completion of training courses and prepare training reports as required.
              
              •	Maintain the record of training suppliers, payment records and files up to date.
              
              •	Performing other tasks as requested.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1.	Full skill practices and applications of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, email.
              
              2.	University student, major in foreign languages, Human Resources, Economics, Business Administration, Education.
              
              3.	Passionate interest in HR, especially recruitment & training.
              
              4.	Excellent communication skills in both English and Vietnamese.
              
              5.	Customer-oriented, friendly, patient, proactive, organized and highly responsible.
              
              6.	Can work full-time during the 3-month internship.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
